610720.name: Mechatronika
610720.description: Mechatronika is an adventure genre game with puzzle elements. The action in the game circles around steampunk and tells a tale of a time after a biological war, the consequences of which proved fatal for the biosphere of the planet. In a city built high in the sky, far away from the poisonous vapor, the residents spend their time without a worry or a care. Meanwhile, all the work is performed by robots. One day, however, something happens and all of the residents were evacuated by robots. The main hero Charlie decides to put a cap on the situation. The fate of the city and its people lies in his very hands. Throughout the game, he makes some unusual friends: a robot guard named Howard and a little sheep named Shaney, who share his daring adventures with him
610720.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
